title: Comprehensive Healthcare Analytics Dashboard
shortDescription: Automated reporting and data visualization for healthcare operations with Power BI
longDescription: Designed and developed a comprehensive healthcare analytics dashboard that replaced manual reporting processes, providing real-time insights into patient outcomes and operational efficiency.
challenge: Healthcare facility needed automated reporting and data visualization to replace manual processes that took hours weekly and provided limited insights into patient outcomes and operational efficiency.
solution: Designed data models, created interactive dashboards, implemented KPI tracking systems, and established automated reporting workflows using Power BI and SQL.
outcome: Reduced reporting time by 35% and increased operational efficiency by 12% through automated KPI tracking and enhanced data transparency.

title: Dynamic Sales Performance Dashboard
shortDescription: Interactive Tableau dashboard for real-time sales metrics and customer segmentation
longDescription: Built an interactive sales performance dashboard with customer segmentation algorithms and dynamic filtering systems for real-time business intelligence.
challenge: Sales team lacked real-time visibility into performance metrics and customer segmentation data, leading to missed opportunities and inefficient targeting strategies.
solution: Built interactive dashboards, implemented customer segmentation algorithms, and created dynamic filtering systems using Tableau, SQL, and Python.
outcome: Boosted analytical efficiency by 25% and increased customer satisfaction by 15% through improved targeting and data accessibility.

title: IoT-Based Solar Tracking System
shortDescription: Arduino-powered automated solar panel tracking for 20% energy efficiency improvement
longDescription: Programmed Arduino controllers with sensor integration systems and real-time tracking algorithms to maximize solar panel energy capture.
challenge: Static solar panels lose significant energy efficiency due to suboptimal sun alignment throughout the day, resulting in 15-30% energy loss compared to tracking systems.
solution: Programmed Arduino controllers, designed sensor integration systems, implemented real-time tracking algorithms, and optimized energy capture mechanisms.
outcome: Increased solar panel energy output by 20% through automated sun tracking and reduced energy loss through precision angle adjustments.

title: Machine Learning Customer Churn Prediction
shortDescription: Predictive ML model with NLP sentiment analysis for customer retention
longDescription: Developed ML models with feature engineering, NLP sentiment analysis, and prediction pipelines for customer behavior analysis and churn prediction.
challenge: Company experienced 15% annual customer churn without early warning systems, leading to reactive rather than proactive retention strategies and revenue loss.
solution: Developed ML models, performed feature engineering, implemented NLP sentiment analysis, and created prediction pipelines for customer behavior analysis.
outcome: Improved customer retention rates by 12% and enhanced customer satisfaction by 10% through predictive analytics and proactive intervention strategies.
